data.name: Holiday Mosaics Halloween Puzzles
data.detailed_description:
Explore 6 locations and unlock 120 mosaics in Holiday Mosaics: Halloween Puzzles. All the puzzles are made from colorful and breathtaking photos. They’ll help you dive into an atmosphere of holiday cheer and give you new ideas for celebrating.

The mosaics are split into pieces of various shapes and sizes. Each new puzzle differs from the last – the pieces are generated at random.
Assemble puzzles on a time limit, earn keys and unlock new locations. Increasing difficulty and several different types of levels await you. Speed mosaics – hurry and assemble the picture as fast as you can. Logical mosaics – puzzles with a high number of pieces and a time limit for assembly. Simple mosaics – a bit of light exercise to warm up for the harder puzzles. And finally, the true challenge – hardcore puzzles, with a multitude of missing pieces and a time limit.

Bored of fighting against the clock? Want to just relax and assemble mosaics? Switch off Timeless Mode in the settings.

Feel the spirit of Halloween in Holiday Mosaics: Halloween Puzzles!

- 120 breathtaking photo mosaics
- Bored of fighting against the clock? Turn on Timeless Mode
- 120 exciting ideas for the holiday – make your Halloween more fun!
- Special quests and 18 trophies for the real pros
- More than 10 hours of gameplay with beautiful calming and cheerful music
- Entertaining gameplay for players of all ages
- Use bonuses and earn new ranks

data.short_description: Holiday Mosaics: Halloween Puzzles – enjoy 120 puzzles made from colorful and breathtaking photos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
